channel.title: Minecraft Released
channel.description:
Let the Autism ensue.
I've had it ever since the alpha, and honestly, it's kind of a game that you play nonstop the first month, and after that you don't play until an update comes out. The experience gets stale after around three months when you've done pretty much everything -- once you had diamond, it's pretty much nothing from there.
Notch has added The End, Endermen are scary as shit now, and now there's boss battles.
What about you lot? What do you all think?
Also, a day in the life of Notch:
[img]http://puu.sh/8W47[/img]
